examples.example: 我发誓一定要通过自己的努力实现梦想。

translate.english: I swear that I must realize my dream through my own efforts.

examples.example: 我发誓会尽自己最大的努力让家人生活得更加幸福。

translate.english: I swear that I will do my best to make my family live a happier life.

examples.example: 我发誓要努力提升自己，成为更好的人。

translate.english: I swear to strive to improve myself and become a better person.
